I had the same problem that it crashed at the beginning of installation.

What I did to make it work: (Im not sure which factors were crucial for not crashing)

1. Deselect installation of revit design review
2. Under the revit main installation you have an expanding arrow, click it and deselect the service pack.
3. I also installed the Uk content

Could not get keygen to work.   
When I click mem patch as instructed, I get an error message "could not get debug privilege! Are you admin?"  I have full admin privileges.  Any suggestions? trying to run 64 bit version.
